subject: 🎉 Welcome to Soulfra API - Your API Key Inside!
body:
Hi NewUser!

Welcome to the Soulfra Freelancer API program! 🚀

Your API key is ready:
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
SK-NcCwIQO0p4J8Oo6lYqP8am_b
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📊 Your Plan Details:
• Tier: Free
• Brand Access: CALRIVEN
• Rate Limit: 100 calls/day
• Endpoints: Comment Generation, Text Classification

📚 API Documentation:

1. Generate AI Comment:
   curl -H "X-API-Key: SK-NcCwIQO0p4J8Oo6lYqP8am_b" \
     "http://localhost:5001/api/v1/calriven/comment?post_id=1"

2. Classify Text:
   curl -H "X-API-Key: SK-NcCwIQO0p4J8Oo6lYqP8am_b" \
     "http://localhost:5001/api/v1/calriven/classify?text=Your+text+here"

3. Check Your Usage:
   View your API stats at: http://localhost:5001/api/stats?key=SK-NcCwIQO0p4J8Oo6lYqP8am_b

💡 Pro Tips:
• Include X-API-Key header in all requests
• Rate limit resets daily at midnight UTC
• Reply to newsletter emails to auto-comment on posts!
• Upgrade to Pro for multi-brand access (1000 calls/day)

🔗 Resources:
• API Docs: http://localhost:5001/api/docs
• Brand Personas: http://localhost:5001/brands
• Community: http://localhost:5001/community

Need help? Reply to this email!

---
Soulfra Platform
Building AI-powered conversation tools
